blog.name: pokemongoexcitement
blog.description: Just a blog about my adventures on Pokemon games. Pokemon Let's Go spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Let's Go Spoilers, Pokemon LGPE Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers. Pokemon Sword and Shield spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Sword and Shield, Pokemon Sword and Shield Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers.

summary: Did anyone else have this problem in Hey You, Pikachu?
title: Did anyone else have this problem in Hey You, Pikachu?
body:
I was thinking about Hey You, Pikachu, and with the benefit of hindsight I could see a pattern going on.

So in Ochre Woods, whenever Pikachu asked if he could give an ingredient to Magnemite I would say, “okay.” Pikachu would always act as if I’d say no, though, and throw the item to the side (if I was lucky, that is). But I never had this problem when I just said “Magnemite.” 

Was this just something to do with voice recognition being new, or was it just my voice that made Pikachu think me saying, “Okay” was a “No?”

Was this just something to do with voice recognition being new, or was it just my voice that made Pikachu think me saying, “Okay” was a “No?”

Was this just something to do with voice recognition being new, or was it just my voice that made Pikachu think me saying, “Okay” was a “No?”

summary: yall i just came up with something
title: yall i just came up with something
body:
POKEMON / OVERWATCH CROSSOVER!!

i know im not the only one to cross the series together but i thought this sounded really cool??? im gonna make their teams next and maybe draw them

also i see characters like pharah, mccree, and soldier would be maybe plot characters that you maybe battle a couple times. junk would be a minor character that you see when you got to roadhog’s gym’s town, hammond would probably live in the pokemon lab with mercy and winston, and i see efi being the character that’s in charge of the PC and orisa would help her out with stuff. and torb would probably live in your hometown at brig’s house (along with bastion). and idk about zen lol

tags: Twitch chat is nuts for Duplica xD
summary: (9/18/18) The Pokémon marathon on Twitch is now LIVE! The next 13 episodes that is going to be streamed (from Season 4 Johto...
body:
(9/18/18) The Pokémon marathon on Twitch is now LIVE!

The next 13 episodes that is going to be streamed (from Season 4 Johto League Champions) today will feature Gary’s Umbreon for the first time, a Wobbuffet village, the highly anticipated return of Duplica, Gym leader Morty in the house, the Kimono sisters in action, and much much more!

The episode set will rerun in multiple times today just so you won’t miss the stream depending on your schedule.

Watching with Twitch chat could be the best (or worst) experience you’ll ever have! But if you want a more comfy chat experience, feel free to talk/chat about the marathon in my Pokémon Discord server PokéTōku —> Invite link here :)

blog.name: mrgelo97
blog.title: MrGelo's Creative Archive
blog.description: A world inhabited by cute and bizzare creatures.

summary:
Gen 1 Pokemon Drawings on the wall.

Just a little side project I recently finished. But this vision I had of all these Pokemon...
caption:
Gen 1 Pokemon Drawings on the wall.

Just a little side project I recently finished. But this vision I had of all these Pokemon on the wall was a project 2 and a half years in the making.
I actually drew all of these guys in early 2016, and sometime in 2017 I got the idea to take all these drawings, that were previously in a sketchbook, and cut them out and have them make up a cool collage on the wall.

So after months of procrastination I, with the assistance of my sister got all these drawings cutout and stuck to the wall.

Hopefully it was worth the effort and people thinks it looks as cool as I think it came out.:D

#mrgelo97 #pokemon #generation1 #kanto #151pokemon #originalpokemon #collage #cutouts #drawings #fanart #videogame #nintendo #cool #artsy #thisprobablytookalongtimetomake


https://www.instagram.com/p/Bn4BXDKlBFh/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=1lg7yny0334if

summary: A Goddess Calming Titans  So my sister and I both thought that Ashes by Céline Dion was so good, so beautiful and calming, that...
caption:
A Goddess Calming Titans

So my sister and I both thought that Ashes by Céline Dion was so good, so beautiful and calming, that it would work just as well to calm rage as Oracion did in Pokémon 10.

…so…I made this. ;3

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Hootlet Hoothoot and Rowlet fusion Flying/Grass Type Ability: Keen Eye/ Insomnia Stats: HP - 70, Atk - 45, Def - 45, SpA - 52,...
caption:
Hootlet

Hoothoot and Rowlet fusion

Flying/Grass Type

Ability: Keen Eye/ Insomnia

Stats: HP - 70, Atk - 45, Def - 45, SpA - 52, SpD - 60, Spe - 53

The Leaf Owl Pokemon

Hootlet can be seen flying in the night sky hunting bug pokemon. It’s considered a wise and deadly pokemon. It uses its wings and feet to attack its prey.  It can use the leaves on its head to tell the time.

Request for @happystool3. I hope you like it!

Pokemons that are lesbians:

  • Staraptor

blog.name: pokebiologist
blog.title: Pokémon Biology
blog.description: I'm Theodora, but you can call me Thea! I'm a Battle Girl turned Pokémon Researcher, and I'm excited to share my observations with you. Feel free to ask, submit, request, and share your own findings!

summary: Hi!! I've had an Absol for almost my entire life and he's come with me when I moved out. Problem is I live alone and work, and I...
question: Hi!! I've had an Absol for almost my entire life and he's come with me when I moved out. Problem is I live alone and work, and I don't want to leave him alone for so long since he's always lived with more than one person. Could you think of any Pokemon that would be a good companion for him so he doesn't get so stressed and lonely while he's alone for the few hours of the day?
answer:
Well, luckily Absol do pretty well on their own, so you don’t have to worry too much. They generally do best with Pokémon of calmer natures that can also be worthy training partners. Asuming that you’re in Hoenn, I would recommend a Nuzleaf, or even a Zangoose if you do best with mammalian Pokémon.

-Thea

blog.name: mynintendonews
blog.title: My Nintendo News
blog.description: The latest Nintendo news 24/7

summary: Pokemon: Let's Go Pikachu And Eevee Won't Have Held Items Or Abilities
title: Pokemon: Let's Go Pikachu And Eevee Won't Have Held Items Or Abilities
body:
Pokemon: Let’s Go Pikachu And Eevee Won’t Have Held Items Or Abilities

The upcoming new Pokemon adventures for the Nintendo Switch, Pokemon: Let’s Go, Pikachu and Eevee, won’t feature a number of things we have seen in the established handheld series. The latest omission is that the game won’t have the traditional held items or abilities. The following was discovered by Serebii after a recent Pokemon: Let’s Go, Pikachu! and Pokemon: Let’s Go, Eevee! preview session.

View On WordPress
